ygData.subject: I'm Back

 I'm back and after a relaxining weekend I see how rude I've been. I 
have a compromise. I'll stop all these stupid OOCs if I can break 
another small rule. Schools starting soona and I'm trying to get my 
grade up so can you cut me some slack on the rule about posting every 
5 days. Also I have some questions about some posts I'm going to be 
putting up soon.
1.If it doesn't carry more than 3 people its movable unless it has a 
C.R. chamber right?
2.There is no special criteria for a ship right?

 By the way I intend to mention the Rocak in future posts so please 
don't grab them up for yourselves.
